# supporter: Convenience Functions for the Typical R Coder
```{r, prep-snippets, echo = FALSE}
# download the snippets to insert later on
## define temporary file paths
file_path_installation_notice_dev <- tempfile(pattern = "installation_notice_dev_")
file_path_literate_programming_notice <- tempfile(pattern = "literate_programming_notice_")

## download the files
download.file(url = "https://gitlab.com/salim_b/r/snippets/raw/master/R%20Markdown/installation_notice_dev_version_gitlab.Rmd",
              destfile = file_path_installation_notice_dev,
              quiet = TRUE)
download.file(url = "https://gitlab.com/salim_b/r/snippets/raw/master/R%20Markdown/literate_programming_notice.Rmd",
              destfile = file_path_literate_programming_notice,
              quiet = TRUE)
```
This package combines a variety of convenience functions which aren't found in any other tidyverse-style R packages.
